snippet: Marc Smirnoff, the editor of the Oxford American, a Southern literary magazine, has been fired after accusations of sexual harassment and has started an aggressive public counteroffensive.
abstract: Marc Smirnoff, former editor of the Oxford American literary magazine, has begun an aggressive public counteroffensive after being fired over accusations of sexual harassment.
lead_paragraph: Marc Smirnoff, the editor of the Oxford American, a Southern literary magazine, has been fired after accusations of sexual harassment and has started an aggressive public counteroffensive.

headline.seo: ‘Oxford American’ Editor Fired in Sex Harassment
